# shared()

**Type Method**

Returns the shared instance of the event handler.

## Declaration

```swift
class func shared() -> GKTurnBasedEventHandler
```

## Return Value

An event handler object.

## Discussion

Your game never directly creates a [doc://com.apple.gamekit/documentation/GameKit/GKTurnBasedEventHandler] object. Instead, retrieve the shared instance using this class method.
